articles.title: Inside Mirakl's agentic commerce vision
articles.summary: Mirakl is pioneering "agentic commerce," a revolutionary approach that empowers businesses to create personalized, AI-driven shopping experiences. This innovative vision combines data analytics, machine learning, and automation to help companies build stronger customer relationships and drive growth. By leveraging agentic commerce, businesses can stay ahead of the curve in the rapidly evolving e-commerce landscape.

articles.title: Funding grants for new research into AI and mental health
articles.summary: Researchers have been awarded funding grants to explore the intersection of AI and mental health, aiming to develop innovative solutions for diagnosis, treatment, and support. This new research has the potential to revolutionize mental health care by leveraging AI's capabilities to analyze complex data and provide personalized interventions. The grants will enable scientists to investigate AI-driven approaches to improve mental health outcomes and address pressing issues in the field.

articles.title: OpenAI and NORAD team up to bring new magic to “NORAD Tracks Santa”
articles.summary: OpenAI has partnered with NORAD to enhance the "NORAD Tracks Santa" program, leveraging AI technology to create a more immersive and interactive experience for children. This collaboration will bring new magic to the traditional holiday program, which has been tracking Santa's journey for over 60 years. The integration of AI will enable more personalized and engaging interactions with Santa, making the experience even more special for kids worldwide.

articles.title: Accenture and OpenAI accelerate enterprise AI success
articles.summary: Accenture has partnered with OpenAI to accelerate the adoption of artificial intelligence (AI) in enterprises, enabling businesses to harness the power of AI for innovation and growth. This collaboration aims to help companies develop and implement AI solutions more efficiently, driving digital transformation and improved performance. By combining Accenture's expertise with OpenAI's cutting-edge technology, businesses can unlock new opportunities and stay ahead of the curve in the rapidly evolving AI landscape.

articles.title: OpenAI takes an ownership stake in Thrive Holdings to accelerate enterprise AI adoption
articles.summary: OpenAI has taken an ownership stake in Thrive Holdings, aiming to accelerate the adoption of AI solutions in the enterprise sector. This strategic investment is expected to enhance Thrive's capabilities in developing and implementing AI-powered products. The partnership will likely drive innovation and growth in the enterprise AI market, expanding OpenAI's reach and influence.

articles.title: Transformers v5: Simple model definitions powering the AI ecosystem
articles.summary: The latest Transformers v5 release simplifies model definitions, making it easier for developers to build and integrate AI models into their applications. This update empowers the AI ecosystem by providing a more accessible and flexible framework for natural language processing and other AI tasks. By streamlining model definitions, Transformers v5 accelerates innovation and adoption of AI technologies across various industries.

articles.title: Diffusers welcomes FLUX-2
articles.summary: Diffusers has introduced FLUX-2, a new addition to its platform, which is expected to bring enhanced capabilities and improvements. FLUX-2 aims to revolutionize the way users interact with and generate content, leveraging cutting-edge technology. This update is set to have a significant impact on the creative community, offering new possibilities for artistic expression and innovation.

articles.title: Continuous batching from first principles
articles.summary: Researchers have introduced a new approach to continuous batching, a technique that enables more efficient processing of data in artificial intelligence models. By rebuilding batching from first principles, this method has the potential to significantly improve the speed and accuracy of AI systems. This innovation could lead to breakthroughs in areas such as natural language processing and computer vision.

articles.title: 20x Faster TRL Fine-tuning with RapidFire AI
articles.summary: RapidFire AI has introduced a groundbreaking solution that accelerates TRL fine-tuning by 20 times, significantly enhancing the efficiency of machine learning model development. This innovation enables faster and more accurate training of large language models, paving the way for improved AI applications. By streamlining the fine-tuning process, RapidFire AI's solution has the potential to revolutionize the field of natural language processing.

articles.title: Open ASR Leaderboard: Trends and Insights with New Multilingual & Long-Form Tracks
articles.summary: The Open ASR Leaderboard has introduced new multilingual and long-form tracks, providing a more comprehensive evaluation of automatic speech recognition (ASR) systems. This update enables researchers to assess ASR performance across diverse languages and longer audio recordings, driving innovation in speech-to-text technology. The expanded leaderboard is expected to foster advancements in ASR accuracy and usability, particularly for global and real-world applications.

articles.title: Amazon launches Trainium3
articles.summary: Amazon has launched Trainium3, its third-generation AI training chip, which promises to significantly boost machine learning performance while reducing costs. This innovation is expected to enhance the capabilities of Amazon's AI services, such as Alexa and SageMaker, and accelerate the development of more complex AI models. With Trainium3, Amazon aims to solidify its position in the rapidly evolving AI landscape.

articles.title: OpenAI declares 'code red' as Google catches up in AI race
articles.summary: OpenAI has reportedly declared a "code red" alert as Google's AI developments, particularly its Gemini model, are rapidly closing the gap with OpenAI's technology. This sudden surge by Google has raised concerns that OpenAI may lose its lead in the AI market. The increased competition is expected to drive innovation and advancements in the field of artificial intelligence.

articles.title: Mistral 3 family of models released
articles.summary: The Mistral 3 family of models has been released, offering a new generation of AI capabilities with improved performance and efficiency. This update is expected to enhance various applications, including natural language processing and computer vision. The Mistral 3 models promise to deliver faster and more accurate results, paving the way for innovative solutions in AI-driven industries.

articles.title: 4.3M Browsers Infected: Inside ShadyPanda's 7-Year Malware Campaign
articles.summary: Researchers have uncovered a 7-year malware campaign, dubbed ShadyPanda, that has infected over 4.3 million browsers worldwide. The malware uses browser extensions to hijack user data and redirect searches to generate revenue. This long-running campaign highlights the persistence and sophistication of modern cyber threats, emphasizing the need for robust browser security measures.

articles.title: Apple Releases Open Weights Video Model
articles.summary: Apple has released Open Weights, an open-source video model that enables developers to generate high-quality videos using artificial intelligence. This innovation has the potential to revolutionize video content creation, allowing for more efficient and personalized video production. By making Open Weights available, Apple is democratizing access to advanced video generation technology, paving the way for new applications and use cases.

articles.title: What will enter the public domain in 2026?
articles.summary: In 2026, works published in 1925 will enter the public domain, making classic films, music, and literature from that year freely available for use and adaptation. This includes notable works like F. Scott Fitzgerald's "The Great Gatsby" and Virginia Woolf's "Mrs. Dalloway". The public domain expansion will enable new creative projects and innovations to build upon these iconic works.
